translations: adj.少量的，不足的；（衣服）暴露的，紧（身）的
n.<非正式>女式小短裤（或衬裤）（scanties）

phrs.translation: 贫乏的, 缺乏, 不足的, 稀疏的
稀疏薄壁组织, 稀有植物

sentences.sentence: The boy followed the old man, who commanded him to open the bag in which he carried his scanty dinner.
sentences.translation: 男孩跟着老人，老人命令他打开袋子，袋子里装着他仅有的晚餐。

sentences.sentence: Details of his life are scanty.
sentences.translation: 关于他的生平，详细资料不多。

sentences.sentence: So far, what scanty evidence we have points to two suspects.
sentences.translation: 目前，我们指向两名嫌犯的证据太少。
